markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Scroll Cache](/Feats.aspx?ID=2056) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 189 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Scroll Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=74)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Scroll Cache](/Feats.aspx?ID=2054)

</column>

---

Your scroll collection is more powerful. In addition to your daily scrolls from Basic Scroll Cache, add a scroll with a 3rd-level spell. At 14th level, add a scroll with a 4th-level spell. At 16th level, add a scroll with a 5th-level spell.

<title level="2">Expert Scroll Cache leads to...</title>
[Master Scroll Cache](/Feats.aspx?ID=2057)
name: Expert Scroll Cache
